Zinzy Waleson Geene
Yes, and —

I'm a researcher and designer from Amsterdam, exploring life, work, play, and the rest of the world through words and drawings.

Jan 19, 2023
  • Read full post
  • Read my diary

My work

For the past 16 years, I've gained experience building, designing, and researching digital products and services. Currently, I'm a UX Manager at Leeruniek, where we take a data-driven approach to equitable primary education. My portfolio is available upon request.

Primarily,

I love to add the right amount of WD-40 to products, services, habits, tools, and teams

Strategic research

I solve business challenges by finding the most effective ways to engage with users

Leadership

I mentor designers, developers, and customer service reps in interdisciplinary collaboration

Enterprise SaaS

I'm specialized in crafting services and products that people use to solve problems at work

I’ve been yelling at Internet clouds since 1997.

This website is a quiet street on the Internet where I come to learn in public, share my perspective, change my mind, and nurture my interests.

Born and raised in the Dutch South, I now live and work in Amsterdam. In its finest neighborhood, de Indische Buurt, I share a shoebox and a petit garden with Anja, and soon also puppy Lemonade.

I'm a lifelong learner, an amateur musician, a curious home cook, a cautious Afropean queer Catholic, and a shameless urbanite. Currently you can find me diving head-first into minimalist compositions for the piano.
